Outerface Patch Data

These classes implement a face centered patch data type; however, the domain is restricted to the faces on the boundary of each patch. These are normally used to represent flux data on patch boundaries.
  • SAMRAI::pdat::OuterfaceDataFactory
  • SAMRAI::pdat::OuterfaceData
  • SAMRAI::pdat::OuterfaceVariable
